content: krystal shawl krystal shawl by marilyn prince this pattern was designed by myself any similarity to other designs is purely coincidental i designed this shawl to use up only one ball of roll with it yarn and be easy enough for a beginner knitter to make you start with a few stitches and increase along one edge while slowly decreasing along the other edge creating a rounded crescent shaped asymmetrical shawl this shawl alternates garter stitch sections and easy lace sections then finishes off with a very easy to do picot bind off yarn red heart roll with it sparkle 5 29 oz notions 150g 561 yds 513m one ball i used colorway krystal ● yarn needle needles ● us size 8 5mm circular needles or gauge 18 sts and 29 row = 4 10cm size to obtain gauge over garter stitch finished measurements ● 37 94cm wide x 44 112cm long abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es yif = yarn in front kfb = knit into front and back of same stitch k2tog = knit 2 sts together to make one stitch yo = yarn over pattern instructions cast on 6 sts garter stitch section row 1 slip first st yif kfb k to last 2 sts k2tog row 2 slip first st yif k to last 2 sts kfb k1 repeat these 2 row until you have 40 sts on needle lace section row 1 slip first st yif kfb k across to last 2 sts k2tog row 2 slip first st yif p across to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 3 slip first st yif kfb k3 yo k2tog k3 repeat across as many times as possible then k to last 2 sts k2tog row 4 slip first st yif p across to last 2 sts kfb k1 repeat row 3 and 4 9 times more 10 row of yo s repeat garter st section 5 times 10 row repeat lace section and garter st sections 5 times more note my last garter st section was where my last color change started so i continued in garter st pattern until almost out of yarn=7 more repeats 12 garter st ridges = 24 row picot bind off 1 cast on 2 sts using knitted cast on k 1 st but don t slip the st off the needle take that new st and slip back onto left hand needle twice = 2 new stitches on left hand needle 2 with right needle tip lift the 2nd st on left needle over the 1st st and off the needle 3 with right needle tip lift the now 2nd st on left needle over the 1st st and off the needle 4 slip the 1st st to right needle purl-wise 5 on left needle k2tog there are now 2 sts on right needle 6 on right needle lift the right st over the left and off the needle 7 slip the st on
